add_user_supervisor: 為 %{uname} 添加主管 [[ Add Supervisor for %{uname}
add_supervisee: 讓我成為別人的主管 [[ Make Me someone else's Supervisor
add_other_supervisee: 讓%{uname}成為別人的主管 [[ Make %{uname} someone else's Supervisor
supervisor_adding_explainer: 出於安全原因，傳播者必須從他們的帳戶中將您添加為主管。在通訊器的設備或帳戶上，輸入您的用戶名以將自己添加為主管。 [[ For security reasons, communicators must add you as a supervisor from their account. On the communicator's device or account, enter your user name to add yourself as a supervisor.
my_supervisees: 我監督的人 [[ People I Supervise
error_loading_connections: 加載監管用戶時出錯 [[ There was an error loading supervision users
remove_this_goal: 刪除此目標 [[ Remove this Goal
delete_or_retire: 您想完全刪除此目標，還是直接將其停用並保留為過去的目標？已刪除的目標將永遠消失，但過去的目標仍可用於查看進度和報告。 [[ Would you like to delete this goal completely, or just retire it and keep it as a past goal? Deleted goals are gone forever, but past goals are still available to review progress and reports.
confirm_delete_goal: 確定要刪除此目標嗎？附加到目標的任何進度和報告將不再可用。 [[ Are you sure you want to delete this goal? Any progress and reports attached to the goal will no longer be available.
error_deleting_goal: 嘗試更新目標時出錯 [[ There was an error trying to update the goal
add_board_to_sidebar: 將板添加到側邊欄 [[ Add Board to Sidebar
sidebar_boards_explanation: 側邊欄是一組快速鏈接，您可以使用它們跳轉到除主頁之外的常用板。它可用於學校或家庭特定的板集、快速短語、鍵盤訪問等。 [[ The sidebar is a set of quick links you can use to jump to commonly-used boards other than the home board. It can be useful for school or home-specific board sets, quick phrases, keyboard access, etc.
set_home_lock_sidebar: 從側邊欄加載時設置為臨時主頁 [[ Set as temporary Home when loaded from the sidebar
which_user_set_as_sidebar: 您想為哪個用戶添加 %{board_key} 作為側邊欄板？ [[ For which user would you like to add %{board_key} as a sidebar board?
add_to_sidebar_failed: 添加到側邊欄意外失敗 [[ Adding to sidebar failed unexpectedly
adding_to_sidebar: 添加到側邊欄... [[ Adding to Sidebar...

windows_explainer: 您可以將 %app_name% 作為 Windows 桌面應用程序安裝在您的計算機或 Windows 設備上。 Windows 上的 CoughDrop 具有一些眼動追踪集成，可幫助它在更多設備上更好地工作。請確保為您的操作系統下載正確的版本。 [[ You can install %app_name% as a Windows desktop app on your computer or Windows device. CoughDrop on Windows has some eye-tracking integrations that will help it work better with more devices. Please make sure to download the right version for your operating system.
browser_explainer: %app_name% 是一個網絡優先的應用程序，應該適用於許多現代網絡瀏覽器。某些瀏覽器可能存在阻止某些功能工作的怪癖，如果發生這種情況，請告知我們。如果您遇到兼容性問題，請考慮使用 Chrome 作為您的默認瀏覽器。 [[ %app_name% is a web-first application, and should work with many modern web browsers. Please consider using Chrome as your default browser if you are running into compatibility issues.

button_count_prompt:
偉大的！這是您的主板現在的樣子。如果需要，您可以對其進行微調以顯示更少或更多的按鈕來啟動。您可以從只使用幾個按鈕的基本級別開始，或者立即顯示所有內容。

您可以通過調整通信器的級別輕鬆更改稍後顯示的按鈕數量。 [[ Great! Here's what your home board will look like right now. If you want, you can fine-tune it to show fewer or more button to start off. You can start at a basic level with only a few buttons, or show everything right away.

You can easily change the number of buttons shown later by adjusting the level for the communicator.
grid_prompt:
燦爛！接下來讓我們看看什麼尺寸的按鈕效果最好！如果按鈕太大，那麼隨著時間的推移將沒有空間增長 - 嘗試找到您的通信器可以可靠使用的最小尺寸。

請記住，如果按鈕太大，您始終可以隱藏按鈕board 起初是壓倒性的，但以後很難更改網格大小。 [[ Splendid! Next let's figure out what size of buttons will work best! If the buttons are too big then there won't be room to grow over time -- try to find the smallest size that your communicator can reliably use.

Remember that you can always hide buttons if a large board is overwhelming at first, but it's harder to change the grid size later.

bulk_purchase_explainer: 我們喜歡與希望支持多個溝通者的學區和組織合作！如果您有興趣購買多個許可證、使用 PCard 或不使用信用卡購買，請聯繫我們的銷售團隊了解更多信息。請注意，許多 PCard 也可以與我們的在線信用卡處理系統一起使用。 [[ We love working with school districts and organizations who want to support multiple communicators! If you're interested in purchasing multiple licenses, using a PCard, or purchasing without using a credit card, please contact our sales team for more information. Note that many PCards will work with our online credit card processing system as well.

expiration_notes_pre: 我們不想關閉任何人的聲音，即使資金意外成為一個問題。當用戶的訂閱到期時，%app_name% 仍可用作通信系統，但報告和視頻筆記等高級功能將被禁用。 [[ We don't want to shut off anyone's voice, even if funding unexpectedly becomes an issue down the line. When a user's subscription expires %app_name% will still work as a communication system but premium features like reporting and video notes will be disabled.

robust_1: 強大的詞彙起初可能看起來有點嚇人，但它們可以是強大的語言集，交流者可以隨著時間的推移而成長。嘗試更多地關注通信器可以成功訪問的按鈕數量，而不是屏幕的繁忙程度，因為您始終可以隱藏按鈕併計劃稍後重新啟用它們。這些板集可以強調運動規劃或務實的溝通，但都具有很好的核心和專業詞彙集合，以及個性化詞彙的空間。 [[ Robust vocabularies may seem a little intimidating at first, but they can be powerful language sets that the communicator can grow into over time. Try to focus more on how many buttons the communicator can successfully access rather than how busy the screen is, because you can always hide buttons and plan to re-enable them later. These board sets can have an emphasis on motor planning or pragmatic communication, but all have a good collection of core and specialized words, and room for personalized vocabulary as well.
cause_effect_1: 對於剛接觸 AAC 的溝通者來說，有時從非溝通板開始是有益的，只是為了幫助他們了解他們可以按下按鈕，事情就會發生。這些因果板可以幫助培訓溝通者如何以有趣的方式使用他們的訪問方法。 [[ For communicators that are brand-new to AAC, sometimes it's beneficial to start with a non-communication board, just to help them learn that they can hit buttons and things will happen. These cause-and-effect boards can help train communicators how to use their access method in a fun way.
simple_starts_1: 對於一些溝通者來說，從一小組簡單的按鈕開始可以幫助他們熟悉使用 AAC。從簡單的板組轉移到更強大或更長期的板組可能會更棘手，但每個溝通者都是不同的。 [[ For some communicators starting with a small set of simple buttons can help them get comfortable using AAC. It can be trickier to move from a simple board set to something more robust or long-term, but each communicator is different.
functional_1: 有時，強調更多功能性的溝通對溝通者來說是有價值的。在開始使用 AAC 時，根據溝通者的發展水平，功能板可以更直觀。 [[ Sometimes an emphasis on more functional communication can be of value for communicators. Depending on a communicator's developmental level when starting to use AAC, functional boards can be more intuitive.
phrases_1: 對於會說話的交流者，錄製自己的聲音進行回放可能會在壓力情況下或對於像 ALS 這樣的退行性疾病有所幫助。基於短語的板可以成為這些溝通者的有用模板，並且與 %app_name% 的內置記錄工具配合使用，可以輕鬆地為溝通者創建消息庫。 [[ For communicators that can speak, recording their own voice for playback can be helpful in stressful situations, or for degenerative conditions like ALS. Phrase-based boards can be a useful template for these communicators, and work well with %app_name%'s built-in recording tools to easily create message banks for the communicator.
keyboards_1: %app_name% 支持包含單詞預測的自定義鍵盤，因此可以熟練拼寫的交流者可能會受益於基於鍵盤的板組。一些鍵盤帶有快速短語或常用詞，以幫助加快溝通速度。 [[ %app_name% supports custom keyboards that include word prediction, so communicators that can spell proficiently may benefit from keyboard-based board sets. Some keyboards come with quick phrases or common words to help speed up communication.

button_suggestions_explainer: 有時很難知道要添加哪些單詞或短語。以下是添加到用戶板集的一些建議。 [[ Sometimes it's hard to know what words or phrases to add. Below are some suggestions for things to add to the user's board set.
add_buttons: 板上沒有地方可以添加按鈕。您仍然可以瀏覽想法，但要添加想法，您需要添加行/列或找到另一個板。 [[ There's nowhere on the board to add buttons. You can still browse ideas, but to add ideas you'll need to add rows/columns or find another board.

purchase_subscription_1e: Extra Ideas 是一項 %app_name% 功能，僅適用於擁有付費高級帳戶的用戶。請 [[ Extra Ideas is a %app_name% feature that's only available to users who have a paid premium account. Please
core_explainer: 核心詞是常用詞，通常具有多種含義或意圖。它們在許多不同的環境中都很有用，並且對於許多交流者來說是有價值的高頻詞。瀏覽列表以查找可能對當前董事會有意義的任何核心詞。 [[ Core words are frequently-used words that often have multiple meanings or intents. They are useful in lots of different settings, and are valuable high-frequency words for many communicators. Browse the list for any core words that might make sense for the current board.
fringe_explainer: 邊緣詞是專門或特定的詞，如人或食物類型。溝通者應該能夠接觸到代表他們的興趣、聯繫和他們正在學習的事物的邊緣詞彙。瀏覽類別以查找單詞或獲取可以添加到當前板的單詞的想法。 [[ Fringe words are specialized or specific words, like people or types of food. Communicators should have access to fringe words that represent their interests, connections, and things they are learning about. Browse the categories to find words or get ideas for words that could be added to the current board.
recordings_explainer: 對於一些交流者來說，記錄他們將來想要更容易使用的單詞或短語可能很有用。您可以從錄音列表中選擇短語以將它們快速添加到當前板。 [[ It can be useful for some communicators to record words or phrases that they will want to use more easily in the future. You can select phrases from the list of recordings to have them quickly added to the current board.
requests_explainer: 溝通者和主管可以請求將單詞添加到他們的詞彙集中。此列表包括已為通信器請求的所有單詞。您可以選擇任何將它們添加到當前板。 [[ Communicators and supervisors can request to have words added to their vocabulary set. This list includes all the words that have been requested for a communicator. You can select any to have them added to the current board.

If you have a LessonPix account you can connect it to your %app_name% account in your User Profile, and then you and any supervisors will be able to add LessonPix symbols to your boards.

multiple_pricing_options: 我們希望 %app_name% 可供盡可能多的人使用，因此我們提供多種購買選擇。在 2 個月的試用期後，如果您需要更多時間，或者沒有資源來進行大量的前期購買，您可以按月支付 %app_name% 訂閱，或者以大幅折扣購買完整的 %app_name% 許可證。 [[ We want %app_name% to be accessible to as many people as possible, so we offer multiple purchasing options. After the 2-month trial if you need a little more time, or don't have the resources to make a large up-front purchase, you can pay monthly for a %app_name% subscription, or for a hefty discount you can purchase a full %app_name% license.
bulk_information: 我們喜歡與希望支持多個溝通者的學區和組織合作！如果您有興趣購買多個許可證或使用 PCard 或 PO 進行購買，請聯繫我們的銷售團隊了解更多信息。 [[ We love working with school districts and organizations who want to support multiple communicators! If you're interested in purchasing multiple licenses or using a PCard or PO to purchase, please contact our sales team for more information.

stash_explanation: 按鈕存儲可以更輕鬆地在多個板上重複使用或移動按鈕。一旦有任何按鈕，您複製到您的 stash 的按鈕就會出現在這裡。要將按鈕複製到存儲區，請將其拖到存儲區按鈕或單擊按鈕的常規設置區域中的複制按鈕。 [[ The button stash makes it easier to reuse or move buttons across multiple boards. Buttons that you copy to your stash will appear here once there are any. To copy a button to the stash either drag it to the stash button or click the copy button in the General settings area for the button.

you_will_have_sync_for_offline_excl: 完成設置清單並設置主板後，您會看到一個“同步”按鈕，您可以點擊以將所有板保存在本地以供離線使用！ [[ Once you're done with the setup checklist and have a home board set, you'll see a "Sync" button you can hit to save all your boards locally for offline use!
you_can_sync_for_offline: 請記住，使用 CoughDrop 不需要持續的 Internet 連接。只需在您在線時點擊“同步”按鈕，您的所有電路板都將保存在本地以供離線使用！ [[ Remember, you don't need a constant Internet connection to use CoughDrop. Just hit the "Sync" button when you're online and all your boards will be saved locally for offline use!

browser_sync_for_offline: %app_name% 可以在您的瀏覽器中運行，即使在離線時也是如此。如果您需要離線支持，請確保點擊“同步”按鈕，您的電路板將被保存以供離線使用。 [[ %app_name% can work in your browser, even when offline. If you'd like offline support, make sure to hit the "Sync" button and your boards will be saved for offline use.

purchase_instructions: 要購買此板的副本，請訪問 mycoughdrop.com 並通過網站購買。 [[ To purchase a copy of this board, go to mycoughdrop.com and purchase via the website.
a_little_about_aac: 首先，關於 AAC [[ First, A Little About AAC
aac_intro_1: 感謝您註冊%app_name%！我們很高興您能來到這裡，並希望 %app_name% 有所作為。在我們了解一些 %app_name% 的基礎知識之前，我們想談談 AAC。 [[ Thanks for signing up for %app_name%! We're excited you're here and hope %app_name% makes a difference. Before we get into some %app_name% basics, we wanted to talk a little about AAC.
aac_intro_2: AAC（Augmentative and Alternative Communication）是一種幫助培養溝通者被傾聽的工具。 %app_name% 是一種 AAC，您可以在其中選擇代表單詞或字母的按鈕，並且設備會說出用戶選擇的任何內容。 [[ AAC (Augmentative and Alternative Communication) is a tool to help developing communicators be heard. %app_name% is a type of AAC where you select buttons that represent words or letters and the device speaks whatever the user selects.
aac_board_examples: AAC 板示例 [[ AAC Board Examples
aac_intro_22: AAC 可以為那些難以自言自語的人帶來巨大的改變。理想情況下，用戶可以從字典中的任何單詞中選擇，但如果拼寫不是一種選擇，我們需要仔細選擇正確的單詞和短語，以最好地幫助每個人有效地進行交流。 [[ AAC can make a huge difference for people who have a hard time speaking on their own. Ideally users could pick from any word in the dictionary, but if spelling isn't an option, we need to carefully choose the right words and phrases to best help each individual communicate effectively.
aac_intro_3: 在 %app_name% 中，我們將單詞和短語放在按鈕上，這些按鈕被組織為“板”的集合。對於許多不同的用戶和需求，有不同的板組。 [[ In %app_name% we put words and phrases on buttons that are organized as a collection of "boards". There are different board sets for many different users and needs.
choosing_vocabulary: 選擇正確的詞彙 [[ Choosing the Right Vocabulary
core_words_1: 用正確的詞開始一個用戶很重要——而且很難！你如何決定哪些詞應該觸手可及？ [[ Starting a user with the right words is important -- and hard! How do you decide which words someone should have at their fingertips?
core_words_2: 許多人首先想到的是基於需求的溝通（“我需要去洗手間”、“我很受傷”、“我餓了”），而這些都是能夠表達的重要內容。但是，嘗試包含可以以多種方式使用的常用詞也非常有價值。我們稱這些類型的詞為“核心”詞。 [[ Many people think first about needs-based communication ("I need to go to the bathroom", "I am hurting", "I am hungry"), and these are important things to be able to express. However, it's also very valuable to try to include common words that can be used in more than one way. We call these types of words "core" words.
core_words_3: 核心詞是“你”、“我”、“喜歡”、“不”、“去”、“在”等詞。它們可能看起來沒有那麼有用，但隨著時間的推移，用戶會接觸到核心詞單詞可以表達許多不同的想法（“我喜歡”、“不想要”、“你明白了”、“我們什麼時候可以去”）並更有效地加深他們的詞彙量。 [[ Core words are words like "you", "I", "like", "not", "go", "in", etc. They may not seem as useful right away, but over time a user who is exposed to core words can express many different ideas ("I like it", "not want", "you get it", "when can we go there") and more effectively deepen their vocabulary.
core_words_4: 每個用戶都是不同的，但核心和專業單詞和短語的組合通常可以幫助溝通者逐漸增加他們的表達，而不是僅僅表達需求和願望。 [[ Every user is different, but a combination of core and specialized words and phrases can often help a communicator grow their expression gradually, instead of being stuck only expressing needs and wants.
selecting_a_home_board: 選擇主板 [[ Selecting a Home Board
home_board_1: %app_name% 有許多不同的主控板，您可以立即開始使用，也可以隨時復制和個性化。有些板子有幾個大按鈕，有些板子有很多小按鈕。 [[ %app_name% has a number of different home boards that you can start using right away, or copy and personalize as you go. Some boards have a few large buttons, and some have many small buttons.
home_board_2: 更多的按鈕意味著更多的表達選項，但是一些用戶在他們可以可靠地點擊的按鈕上受到限制（請記住，您現在可以隨時隱藏您想要稍後添加的按鈕，因此看起來“太忙”的板可能實際上是他們可以隨著時間的推移而成長的東西）。 [[ More buttons means more options for expression, but some users are limited in how small a button they can reliably hit (keep in mind you can always hide buttons for now that you want to add later, so a board that looks "too busy" may actually be something they can grow into over time).
speak_mode_2: 當您處於說話模式時，您可以點擊按鈕讓它們說話，並添加到頂部的發聲框中。如果您點擊發聲框，它將說出位於那裡的所有按鈕。退格和清除按鈕可以幫助保持句子窗口清潔。 [[ When you're in Speak Mode you can hit buttons to have them spoken, and added to the vocalization box at the top. If you hit the vocalization box it'll speak all the buttons that are located there. The backspace and clear buttons can help keep the sentence window clean.
coughdrop_speak_mode_folders: %app_name% 朗讀模式文件夾 [[ %app_name% Speak Mode Folders
speak_mode_22: 上面有一個小文件夾圖標的按鈕是鏈接按鈕，這意味著如果您選擇它們，它將帶您到另一個板。這使您可以擁有多個級別，其中包含比單個屏幕上容納的更多的單詞和短語。你總是可以通過點擊主頁按鈕回到第一個板。 [[ Buttons that have a little folder icon on them are linked buttons, which means that if you select them it will take you to another board. This lets you have multiple levels, with more words and phrases than could fit on a single screen. You can always get back to the first board by hitting the home button.
coughdrop_exiting_speak_mode: %app_name% 退出說話模式 [[ %app_name% Exiting Speak Mode
speak_mode_3: 您可以通過點擊右上角的用戶菜單退出說話模式。如果您擔心用戶不小心自行退出語音模式，您可以在用戶的首選項中設置 PIN。 [[ You can exit out of Speak Mode by hitting the user menu in the top right corner. If you're worried about a user accidentally exiting Speak Mode on their own, you can set up a PIN in the user's preferences.
intro_modeling_3: 在%app_name%中，圍繞傳播者的支持團隊被稱為“主管”。主管是為溝通者建模並與之一起工作的用戶。他們有自己的登錄名，可能是老師或治療師、父母、照顧者等。 [[ In %app_name%, the support team around the communicator are called "supervisors". Supervisors are users that are modeling for and working with a communicator. They have their own login, and might be a teacher or a therapist, a parent, a caregiver, etc.
intro_modeling_4: 主管被添加到他們的溝通者帳戶中，並且可以在他們自己的設備上查看溝通者的板，因此他們可以熟悉用戶的詞彙以更好地建模，並且如果他們具有編輯權限，則可以添加新的按鈕和短語。 [[ Supervisors are added to their communicator's account, and can see a communicator's boards on their own devices, so they can get comfortable with a user's vocabulary for better modeling, and can add new buttons and phrases if they have editing permission.
logging_and_report: 記錄和報告 [[ Logging and Reports
reports_1: 主管還可以查看用戶的通信歷史記錄。出於隱私原因，默認情況下禁用日誌和報告，但如果您啟用它們，則用戶的主管可以看到他們的通信隨著時間的推移如何進行。 [[ Supervisors can also review a user's communication history. For privacy reasons logs and reports are disabled by default, but if you enable them then the user's supervisors can see how their communication is progressing over time.
coughdrop_logs_and_notes: %app_name% 日誌和註釋 [[ %app_name% Logs and Notes
reports_2: 除了查看使用歷史記錄之外，主管還可以訪問每個通信會話的詳細報告，並可以與用戶的團隊進行記錄和共享，因此每個人都知道當前的策略是什麼，什麼是有效的或無效的。 [[ In addition to reviewing usage history, supervisors can access detailed reports on each communication session, and can make and share notes with the user's team, so everyone knows what the current strategy is and what is or isn't working well.
where_to_learn_more: 在哪裡了解更多信息 [[ Where to Learn More

thanks_continue_learning: 感謝您閱讀 %app_name% 的介紹！希望對您有所幫助！如果您有疑問或想了解更多信息，可以查看一些其他資源。 [[ Thanks for going through this introduction to %app_name%! Hopefully it was helpful for you! If you have questions or want to learn more, you can check out some additional resources.
more_resources_2: 如果您迷路了，您可以隨時點擊儀表板底部的“支持”按鈕尋求幫助，或分享有關我們如何改進 CoughDrop 的反饋。我們隨時為您提供幫助！ [[ If you ever get lost you can always hit the "Support" button at the bottom of the dashboard to ask for help, or to share feedback on how we can improve CoughDrop. We're always here to help!

always_available_boards: 隨時可用的板 [[ Always-Available Boards
offline_boards_explainer: 以下是我們與合作夥伴一起提供的一系列免費且始終可用的緊急和關鍵用途板。下載%app_name%應用程序的任何人都可以訪問這些板，無論是否連接互聯網。 [[ Below is a collection of free and always-available emergency and critical-use boards that we provide along with our partners. Anyone who downloads the %app_name% app will have access to these boards, with or without an Internet connection.

user_search_results: 用戶搜索結果 [[ User Search Results
have_you_tried_modeling: 你試過建模嗎？ [[ Have You Tried Modeling?
modeling_intro_1: 學習使用 AAC 詞彙很像學習一門新語言。當您周圍的人也使用它時，它會容易得多！您可以通過建模來提供幫助，它展示瞭如何使用它的示例（“這就是您可以這樣說的方式”，然後自己點擊按鈕）。有時，在傳播者遵循您的示例之前需要進行大量建模，因此請耐心等待！ [[ Learning to use an AAC vocabulary is a lot like learning a new language. It's much easier when the people around you use it too! You can help by modeling, which is showing examples of how to us it ("here's how you could say this" and then hit the buttons yourself). Sometimes it takes a lot of modeling before a communicator follows your example, so try to be patient!
modeling_intro_2: 建模時，您需要確保您處於建模模式，因此%app_name% 可以區分您的演講和交流者的演講。您可以在儀表板中為通信器“建模”，或者您可以三次點擊清除按鈕以暫時進入建模模式。試一試，親眼看看！ [[ When modeling you'll want to make sure you're in modeling mode, so %app_name% can tell the difference between your speech and the communicator's. You can "model for" a communicator in your dashboard, or you can triple-tap the clear button to temporarily go into modeling mode. Give it a try and see for yourself!
thanks_coughdrop: 感謝您在網絡瀏覽器中嘗試 %app_name%！這是您看到的嵌入網站的演示，因此僅限於說話模式，但如果您訪問該網站，您應該能夠像往常一樣訪問您的帳戶。 [[ Thanks for trying %app_name% in your web browser! This is a demo you're seeing embedded in a web site, so it's limited to speak mode only, but if you visit the web site you should be able to access your account as usual.
thanks_coughdrop_long: 感謝您在網絡瀏覽器中嘗試 %app_name%！這是一個嵌入在網站中的演示，但 %app_name% 是一個強大的增強通信 (AAC) 應用程序，它可以在桌面瀏覽器中作為自己的選項卡運行，或者在平板電腦上的應用程序商店中下載，智能手機。您可以註冊免費試用，看看它是否適合您或您認識的人！ [[ Thanks for trying %app_name% in your web browser! This is a demo you're seeing embedded in a web site, but %app_name% is a powerful augmentative communication (AAC) app that can run as it's own tab in a browser on a desktop, or be downloaded in app stores on tablets and smartphones. You can sign up for a free trial and see if it will work for you or someone you know!
view_this_board_in_coughdrop: 在 %app_name% 中查看 [[ View in %app_name%
back_to_demo: 返回演示 [[ Back to the Demo
contact_us_intro: 問題？建議？俳句？我們很樂意聽取您的意見！我們的目標是建立一種資源來支持溝通者和他們周圍的團隊，這樣我們就可以幫助人們聽到人們的聲音。如果沒有您的幫助和參與，我們幾乎無法做到這一點，所以請給我們留言！ [[ Questions? Suggestions? Haikus? We'd love to hear any of them from you! Our goal is to build a resource that supports communicators and the teams around them so we can help people's voices be heard. We can't do that nearly as well without help and participation from you, so please send us a line!

privacy_wont_work: 您瀏覽器上的隱私設置阻止了%app_name% 的全部功能，因此暫時禁用了登錄和註冊。 %app_name% 使用瀏覽器存儲來存儲用戶身份、離線支持和性能改進等。 [[ The privacy settings on your browser are preventing %app_name% from fully functioning, so login and registration are temporarily disabled. %app_name% uses browser storage for things like user identity, offline support and performance improvements.

gift_details: 有人分享了 %app_name% 的高級會員資格作為禮物送給您！此禮物可讓您免費獲得 %{duration} 的 %app_name% 高級訪問權限。 [[ Someone has shared a premium membership to %app_name% as a gift to you! This gift will give you free premium access to %app_name% for %{duration}.

copy_or_share_board: 當前版塊的作者可能無法訪問此版塊，因為它被標記為私有。你想分享這個板，還是複制它？ [[ The current board's author may not have access to this board as it is marked private. Would you like to share this board, or make a copy of it?

switch_default_languages_prompt: 該板已經有該語言的一些翻譯。您想切換到現有翻譯作為新的默認語言嗎？ [[ This board already has some translations for this language. Would you like to switch to the existing translations as the new default languagee?
applying_translations: 正在應用翻譯... [[ Applying Translations...
error_applying_translations: 應用翻譯時出錯 [[ Error Applying Translations
switch_translation: 切換到現有翻譯 [[ Switch to Existing Translation
delete_this_sound: 移除此聲音 [[ Remove this Sound
confirm_delete_recording: 您確定要刪除此錄音嗎？任何使用它的按鈕將不再起作用。 [[ Are you sure you want to delete this recording? Any buttons using it will no longe work.
error_deleting_sound: 嘗試刪除錄音時出錯 [[ There was an error trying to delete the recording
coughdrop_partners_and_supported_integra: %app_name% 合作夥伴和支持的集成 [[ %app_name% Partners and Supported Integrations
compatibility_intro: %app_name% 致力於與其他公司和組織合作，為傳播者提供最佳體驗。以下是我們提供的一些合作夥伴和兼容資源。 [[ %app_name% is committed to working with other companies and organizations to provide communicators with the best possible experience. Here are some of the partners and compatible resources we have available.
community_partners: 社區合作夥伴 [[ Community Partners
community_partners_explainer: 社區合作夥伴是提供輔助技術資源和工具的技術和支持合作夥伴，這些資源和工具還可以使 %app_name% 對某些傳播者及其支持團隊的使用更加有效。 [[ Community partners are technical and support partners that provide assistive technology resources and tools that can also make %app_name% usage more effective for some communicators and their support teams.
frs_explainer: Forbes AAC 與保險合作，為其 ProSlate 專用平板電腦提供資金，並預裝了 %app_name%。 [[ Forbes AAC works with insurance to get their ProSlate dedicated tablet funded with %app_name% pre-installed.
ablenet_explainer: AbleNet 與保險合作，為他們的 QuickTalker FreeStyle 專用平板電腦提供資金，並預裝了 %app_name%。 [[ AbleNet works with insurance to get their QuickTalker FreeStyle dedicated tablet funded with %app_name% pre-installed.
acapela_explainer: Acapela 為語音生成提供優質合成語音。 Acapela 在 %app_name% 中為 iOS、Android 和 Windows 配音。 [[ Acapela provides premium synthesized voices for speech generation. Acapela voices in %app_name% for iOS, Android and Windows.
switch_explainer: %app_name% 的內置開關激活掃描將與一個或兩個開關動作一起工作。大多數（如果不是全部）藍牙開關應該通過鍵盤仿真與 %app_name% 一起使用，並且在 Windows 上，其他鍵盤樣式的開關也可以在用戶的首選項中進行配置。 [[ %app_name%'s built-in switch-activated scanning will work with one or two switch actions. Most if not all bluetooth switches should work with %app_name% via keyboard emulation, and on Windows other keyboard-style switches can also be configured in a user's preferences.
blue2_explainer: Blue2 開關適用於移動和 Windows 設備，並提供一鍵和兩鍵開關控制 [[ The Blue2 switch worked with mobile and Windows devices and provides one and two-button switch control
eye_trackers_explainer: 在 Windows 設備上，您可以下載並安裝 %app_name% 應用程序以將 %app_name% 與硬件眼動儀配合使用。一些眼動儀（EyeX 和 EyeTribe）目前具有原生集成，而其他眼動儀（Tobii、myGaze、eyetech 等）在光標模式下運行良好。可以在用戶的首選項中配置停留時間和激活距離等設置。 [[ On Windows devices, you can download and install the %app_name% app to use %app_name% with hardware eye trackers. Some eye trackers (EyeX and EyeTribe) currently have native integrations, while others (Tobii, myGaze, eyetech, etc.) work very well running in cursor mode. Settings like dwell time and activation distance can be configured in a user's preferences.
head_pointers_and_mice: 頭指針和鼠標 [[ Head Pointers and Mice
head_mouse_explainer: Windows 上的鼠標光標可以通過多種不同的界面來控制，包括一些標題指針和鼠標工具。這些應用程序和設備可以使用 %app_name% 的內置駐留跟踪進行配置，可在 Windows %app_name% 應用程序中使用。 [[ The mouse cursor on Windows can be controlled by many different kinds of interface, including some header pointers and head mouse tools. These apps and devices can be configured using %app_name%'s built-in dwell tracking, available in the Windows %app_name% app.
camera_mouse_explainer: Camera Mouse 是一款免費的頭部跟踪 Windows 應用程序，它使用計算機的攝像頭來控制鼠標光標。 [[ Camera Mouse is a free head-tracking Windows app that uses the computer's camera to control the mouse cursor.
bluetooth_speakers_explainer: 有些設備沒有足夠大的揚聲器，或者揚聲器指向錯誤的方向，因此它們無法幫助溝通者有效地說話。藍牙音箱可以和%app_name%一起使用，方便交流，甚至讓%app_name%的使用更有趣。 [[ Some devices don't have loud enough speakers, or have speakers that point the wrong direction so they don't help a communicator speak effectively. Bluetooth speakers can be used with %app_name% to facilitate communication, and even to make using %app_name% just a little more fun.
clipster_explainer: ION Clipster 是一款夾式藍牙揚聲器，可以連接到設備並提供額外的音量和直接從通信器傳出的聲音。 [[ ION Clipster is a clip-on bluetooth speaker that can connect to devices and provide additional volume and direct sound out in from of the communicator.
bluebee_explainer: Bluebee Pals 是可愛的毛絨玩具，內置藍牙揚聲器，說話時嘴巴會動。它們可以成為培養溝通者的重要強化工具。 [[ Bluebee Pals are cute stuffed animals with a built-in bluetooth speaker whose mouths move as they speak. They can be a great reinforcement tool for developing communicators.
keyguard_explainer: 對於某些用戶來說，他們可能很難將手指放在正確的按鈕上。鍵盤保護可以幫助他們導航到正確的位置，一些公司可以為幾乎任何 %app_name% 板配置創建自定義鍵盤保護。 [[ For some users it can be hard to get their fingers down on the right buttons. Keyguards can help them navigate to the right place, and some companies can create custom keyguards for just about any %app_name% board configuration.
lasered_pics_explainer: Lasered Pics 可以為許多不同的平板電腦和設備創建自定義鍵盤保護。通過從設備向他們發送屏幕截圖，他們可以支持許多 %app_name% 配置。 [[ Lasered Pics can create custom keyguards for many different tablets and devices. By sending them a screenshot from the device they can support many %app_name% configurations.
frs_keyguards_explainer: Forbes AAC 可以為與 ProSlate 專用平板電腦配合使用的不同 %app_name% 配置創建自定義鍵盤保護。 [[ Forbes AAC can create custom keyguards for different %app_name% configurations that work with their ProSlate dedicated tablets.

edit_sound_details: 編輯錄音詳情 [[ Edit Recording Details
updating_sound: 正在更新錄音... [[ Updating Recording...
error_updating_sound: 更新錄音時出現意外錯誤 [[ There was an unexpected error while updating the recording
two_way_communication_on_profile: 除了使用設備的內置工具進行共享外，%app_name% 還可以設置為雙向文本或電子郵件給自定義聯繫人和主管。您可以在“我的帳戶”下的用戶個人資料中添加聯繫人！ [[ In addition to sharing using the device's built-in tools, %app_name% can be set up for two-way text or email to custom contacts and supervisors. You can add contacts on a user's profile under My Account!
consider_buying_for_contacts: 與付費傳播者合作時，請考慮購買 %app_name% 以訪問此功能。 [[ Please consider purchasing %app_name% to gain access to this feature when working with paid communicators.
consider_communicator_buying_for_contact: 此功能僅限於使用付費通信器帳戶的用戶。 [[ This feature is limited to those working with paid communicator accounts.
currently_premium_required: 此功能僅限於擁有當前活躍的高級帳戶的傳播者 [[ This feature is limited to communicators with a currently-active premium account
copied_to_clipboard: 文本複製到剪貼板！ [[ Text copied to the clipboard!
ios_head_tracking: Apple Face ID 的內置功能支持原生頭部跟踪。對於沒有 Face ID 的設備，將使用基於攝像頭的頭部跟踪器。 [[ The built-in features of Apple Face ID support native head tracking. For devices without Face ID a camera-based head tracker will be used.
supported_head_trackers: 一些設備支持硬件優化頭部跟踪作為 AR 工具集的一部分，對於所有其他設備，將使用基於攝像頭的頭部跟踪器。 [[ Some devices support hardware-optimized head tracking as part of AR toolsets, for all other devices a camera-based head tracker will be used.

allow_core_access_via_utterance_shares: 允許消息接收者將他們的回復與該用戶可用的核心詞列表進行比較 [[ Allow messaging recipients to compare their replies to the list of core words available for this user
auto_capitalize_sentences: 自動將發聲框中的新句子大寫 [[ Automatically capitalize new sentences in the vocalization box
substitute_contractions: 自動替換常見的收縮 [[ Automatically substitute common contractions
recent_cleared_phrases: 保存已清除的短語 [[ Save Cleared Phrases
save_recent_cleared_phrases: 將最近清除的短語保存到“最近”短語類型 [[ Save recently-cleared phrases to the 'Recents' phrase type
ios_gaze_tracking: Apple Face ID 的內置功能支持有限的視線控制。對於沒有 Face ID 的設備，將使用基於攝像頭的頭部跟踪器。 [[ The built-in features of Apple Face ID support limited eye gaze control. For devices without Face ID a camera-based head tracker will be used.

utterance_suggestion: 純文本可以幫助交流者了解單詞如何組合成句子並幫助提高讀寫能力，因為他們看到了對單詞的重視，但它可能並不適合所有用戶。 [[ Text-only can help communicators learn how words combine into sentences and help promote literacy as they see the emphasis on words, but it may not be the best fit for all users.

external_device_enter_log_explainer: 對於使用第三方設備或應用程序的傳播者，您可以手動輸入該用戶的日誌，以使%app_name%的報告和目標跟踪功能生效。為此，只需輸入通訊器使用的單詞或短語，每行按一個“按鈕”即可。 [[ For communicators using a third-party device or app, you can manually enter logs for that user to allow for %app_name%'s reporting and goal tracking features to take effect. To do so, just enter the words or phrases the communicator used, with one "button" press per line.

profiles_explainer: 通信配置文件是評估工具，可用於評估或監控用戶的通信發展。配置文件可以針對溝通者或與他們一起工作的人，並且可以多次運行。他們可以幫助確定用戶的適當目標，並可以幫助團隊協調有效的支持策略。 [[ Communication Profiles are evaluation tools that can be used to assess or monitor a user's communication development. Profiles can target communicators or the people who work with them, and can be run multiple times. They can help with deciding on appropriate goals for a user and can help teams coordinate on effective strategies for support.
profiles_explainer_2: 注意：配置文件應始終在用戶參與的情況下運行，即使他們的參與可能受到限制。此外，個人資料絕不應用作“證據”，證明某人不應獲得全面的溝通支持或適合年齡的學習經驗。 [[ NOTE: Profiles should always be run with the user's involvement, even if their participation may be limited. Also, profiles should never be used as "proof" that someone shouldn't receive full communication supports or age-appropriate learning experiences.

focus_words_explainer: Focus Words 是一種工具，可讓您更輕鬆地訪問與特定主題或活動有關的單詞子集。焦點詞不是創建一個單獨的特定於上下文的詞彙表副本，而是允許傳播者和支持者了解相關詞在傳播者的默認詞彙表中的位置。 [[ Focus Words is a tool for prividing easier access to the subset of words that have to do with a specific topic or activity. Rather than creating a separate context-specific copy of the vocabulary, Focus Words allows communicators and supporters to learn the location of relevant words in the communicator's default vocabulary.
focus_words_explainer2: 您可以通過輸入共享閱讀書的文本、與特定活動相關的單詞等來使用焦點詞。您還可以瀏覽社區的焦點詞集或保存自己的焦點詞集以便快速訪問。 [[ You can use Focus Words by entering the text of a shared reading book, words related to a specific activity, etc. You can also browse the community's collection of Focus Word sets or save your own for quick access.
